tool_description: Find place location and realated data by place name or free-form address.
name: Places by name
title: Places by name

api_list.name: Place by name
api_list.description: Parse, validate, and locate an address or place

required_parameters.name: text
required_parameters.description: Free-form address, place, region or area name

optional_parameters.name: type
optional_parameters.description: Desired result granularity  (country, state, city, postcode, street, or amenity)

optional_parameters.name: countrycodes
optional_parameters.description: Limit search to a comma-separated list of countries (ISO country codes)

optional_parameters.name: lang
optional_parameters.description: Preferable results language code (en, de, it, fr)
